summary.span: 表示 *n* 值元组，其中 *n* 为 8 更大值。

span.span: Represents an *n*-value tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 结构表示具有八个或多个元素的值元组。The structure represents a value tuple that has eight or more elements. 值元组类型不同于元组类型 (如)，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它们是结构 （值类型） 而不是类 （引用类型）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 成员，如和是字段而不是属性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 其字段是可变而不是只读的。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元组类型提供支持的运行时实现[C# 中的元组](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)和 F # 中的结构元组。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 除了创建之外实例通过使用语言语法，你可以调用工厂方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值元组Serialization and value tuples 类型不是可序列化在.NET Core 1.x 或.NET Framework 4.7 及早期版本中。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard，包括.NET Standard 2.0，不强制要求的序列化实例; 是否实例是可序列化取决于单个.NET Standard 实现。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要确定是否类型是特定的.NET 实现上可序列化，获得对象，表示类型并检索的值及其属性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. .NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的可序列化类型的列表，请参阅[二进制序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了使用元组所用语言的内置支持，您还可以创建值元组通过调用静态方法，而无需显式指定其元素的类型。In addition to using your language's build-in support for tuples, you can also create a value tuple by calling the static method without having to explicitly specify the types of its elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在以下情况下：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是值类型。It is a value type. - 其组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 及其组件的当前实例相等。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段中返回嵌套的值元组，但允许访问的第八*n*th 元素的元组。The field returns a nested value tuple that allows access to the eighth though *n*th elements of the tuple. 根据元组中的元素的总数量，可以从嵌套的值元组的检索通过第 14 个组件的第 8 个的值`Item1`通过`Item7`属性。Depending on the total number of elements in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested value tuple's `Item1` through `Item7` properties. 然后，可以使用属性的嵌套要检索的值元组在下一级别的嵌套对象。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the value tuple at the next level of nesting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 仅可使用何时实例转换为接口。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法允许您定义的自定义的比较对象。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，可以使用此方法为顺序对象基于的特定组件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，通常称为通过对集合进行排序方法，包括参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，调用方法和方法对象，它通过使用实例化构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法应在排序操作中使用。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 它不应比较的主要目的在于确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象，调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method.

span.span: is not a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 仅可使用何时实例转换为接口。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当调用实现`other`不是`null`，并可以成功地强制转换为对象具有相同的类型的组件 （包括那些在嵌套的元组对象） 的相同的总数当前实例。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested tuple objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一次传入的值对象进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，方法是再次调用，传递的两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到该方法调用返回`false`时，它将比较一对特定的值或这两个值传递给该方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 仅可使用何时实例转换为接口。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法只是包装调用`comparer`对象的实现。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回字符串的形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*， *Item7*， *Item8*...)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*，并*Item7*表示值， ， ， ， ， ，和字段。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, *Item7*, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and fields. *Item8*表示的值实例的`Next.Item1`字段。*Item8* represents the value of the instance's `Next.Item1` field. 任何其他嵌套的元素的值遵循以下*Item8*。The value of any additional nested elements follows *Item8*. 如果任何字段值为`null`，它表示为。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
